title: Ask HN: Would you use a platform to justify and hire faster?
text: Hi, we want to give a big improvemnt to our human resources platform, from the compliance support for mental health psychosocial risk for employees and employers follow up, to a tool for justifying hiring new employees from a finances perspective and making the hiring process faster for international candidates following a Lean Continuous improvement methodology.

What’s the end goal for you programmers?
text:
Make money forever? Work until you create an income yourself? Contract and retire early?

What’s the goal?

We make so much money very early in our careers that it’s very easy to lose track of what the end goal is.
